Title: Requires bike shares to equip all bicycles with electric assist with speed and location tracking technology
Summary: Requires bike shares to equip all bicycles with electric assist with speed and location tracking technology and to revoke customer account if such customers ride over the speed limit or against the flow of traffic.
LawCode: Add ยง1244, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to certain equipment and reporting requirements for certain businesses that utilize bicycles with electric assist
